vista.graph
Class Axis

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.GEContainer
          vista.graph.Axis
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, BoundedComposite, Composite, Drawable, DrawableComposite, FontResizable, Layoutable
public class Axis
extends GEContainer
implements FontResizable

Axis contains a TickLine for ticks, TickText for tick labels, TextLine for axis labels.

Version:
$Id: Axis.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:48 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu (DWR).

Method Detail

Draw

public void Draw()
Description copied from class: GEContainer
draws its child elements and itself. The child elements are drawn in the order in which they are added (for now).

Overrides:
Draw in class GEContainer

setTickGenerator

public void setTickGenerator(TickGenerator tickGenerator)
Sets the tick generator. One caveat is that it does not affect previous data sets that might have been added before this tick generator took affect. This may mean that the Plot object may have to call the setDCRange again for all the data sets attached to this Axis.

getTickGenerator

public TickGenerator getTickGenerator()
Gets the reference to the currently used tick generator.

setDCRange

public void setDCRange(double min,
                       double max)
This sets the data coordinate range for this axis. Usually obtained from the data set values. This should be called at least once before a drawing operation to set label and TickData objects to non-null values.

Parameters:
min - The minimum value
max - The maximum value
